name: Foundational Push
description: Building core pushing strength and chest definition.

exercises.name: Incline Push-ups
cues: Hands on a stable elevated surface (bed/chair)
Keep core tight and body in a straight line
Lower chest slowly for 3 seconds
Pause for 1 second at the bottom
Explode up in 1 second

exercises.name: Doorway Rows
cues: Stand facing a doorway, hands on the frame
Lean back until arms are straight
Pull your chest toward the frame using your back
Squeeze shoulder blades for 1 second
Control the descent for 2 seconds

exercises.name: Pike Push-ups
cues: Start in a V-shape down-dog position
Lower the top of your head toward the floor
Look back at your feet to keep neck neutral
Push back up to the start position

name: Foundational Pull
description: Building the V-Taper back and pulling power.

exercises.name: Table Rows
cues: Lie under a sturdy table, grab the edge
Pull your chest toward the table
Keep your body straight like a plank
Focus on squeezing the shoulder blades

name: Lower Body Sculpt
description: Toning thighs and building glute foundation.

exercises.name: Paused Squats
cues: Feet shoulder-width apart
Sit back like you're sitting in a chair
Hold the bottom position for 2 full seconds
Drive through heels to stand up

exercises.name: Reverse Lunges
cues: Step back with one foot
Drop the back knee toward the floor
Keep front knee behind toes
Drive through front heel to return

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
cues: Rest back foot on a chair or bed
Sink deep until back knee nearly touches floor
Keep chest up and core engaged
Drive back up with front leg only

exercises.name: High Plank
cues: Push-up position, hands under shoulders
Squeeze glutes and belly button to spine
Don't let your lower back sag
Breathe steadily throughout

exercises.name: Plank Walk-outs
cues: From plank, walk hands forward
Go as far as you can without arching back
Hold briefly, then walk back to start
Keep core rock solid
